title: Can I have 2 RP please? :(
body:
UPDATE: **Topic closed**

UPDATE: Here's my sketch at Zoe inspired poro.

(https://i.gyazo.com/13ab26a228a5b15c9a5205eef83315a9.jpg)

I'm only 2 RP short for buying Zoe's bundle. Please and thank you.

{{sticker:sg-soraka}}

replies.body: Shoot me your best sketch of Zoe or a Zoe inspired poro and I'm sure I could make that happen {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

Better start making an art-piece already!
Assuming you haven't done this before and some rioter accepts it
